about_the_game:
JUMP! FIGHT! CLIMB! SLIME!
A colorful action-platformer game where you climb, as a slime! Dive into the Story-Mode and play a handcrafted, true slime experience with boss-battles, and more! Make & share your own levels with Create-Mode's level-builder or even try to beat ones made by others!

How high can you climb (as a slime)?
Jump and backflip from one platform to the next, collecting coins and power ups, avoiding spikes and enemies, and fighting bosses along the way as you climb as a slime. Learn the secrets of the Subterra and master the ways of the Climbers.
Do you have what it takes to climb to the top?
Journey to the Subterra, a strange and mysterious world where slimes and other creatures live under the surface of the earth. They long to see the light and the stars above but face evil only one creature can beat, YOU. A young climber slime who wishes to help their people by being the first to reach the top. Along the way you discover a tired and old climber named "The Elder Slime" who is past their prime but filled with wisdom that you, the young slime, have yet to learn if you want to reach the top.

Features:

  • A LOT of platforms to jump on (bouncing, moving, electrocuting , EXPLODING…)

  • HARD boss battles, dungeons and parkour! (skills are needed!)

  • Unique creatures to discover (boxjellys, leadpods, industrialjellys)

  • LEVEL BUILDER complete with almost every object in the sandbox to use!

  • BIG obstacles to avoid (spikes, shocking walls and many, many dangerous creatures)

  • Gain new abilities to reach higher places and fight stronger enemies!

  • Collect coins and characters!

  • NEW! - More than 100 unique areas to discover!

  • Great soundtrack! (I made it)
